text: Claude Code Pro Tip: Always use planning mode before building anything. Hit Shift+Tab to turn on plan mode, describe what you want, let Claude create a detailed plan, then switch to execution mode. This one trick eliminates 90% of bugs and messy code.
author: Prajwal Tomar
